summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from March 1, 2018, to March 31, 2018. It details various transactions including outgoing money transfers, deposits, and service charges, highlighting significant financial movements during the period.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfickt
persons.context: Steuart Oldfickt is mentioned as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

events.title: Beginning Balance

events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $350,809.00 was made to Wells Fargo Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $300,000.00 was made to Silicon Valley Bank.

events.title: Ending Balance
events.description: The account had an ending balance of $5,046,044.90.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $1,096,324.28 on March 1, 2018.
A total of $1,150,809.00 was debited from the account during the statement period.
Significant outgoing transfers included $350,809.00 to Wells Fargo Bank and $300,000.00 to Silicon Valley Bank.
The account earned $529.62 in interest during the statement period.
The ending balance as of March 31, 2018, was $5,046,044.90.
